main event: A woman observed large flying saucers making a whirring sound and flying on edge in White Plains, N.Y. on July 27, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were described as twin spheres that appeared to make a right angle turn and then vanish., The sighting lasted approximately 60 seconds and occurred in clear weather conditions., The objects made a muffled sound similar to a small steamer., The witness thought the objects were too beautiful to be earthly creations., The woman described herself as a housewife, 54 years old, with a background in art and portrait painting.
sighted object: twin spheres flying in the sky
